R-learner

R_learner.Rd

Estimates and Predicts R-learner using regression forests. The estimation is conducted in full-sample.

Usage

R_learner(X, W, Y, train_idx, e)

Arguments

X

Feature matrix

W

Binary treatment indicator

Y

Response variable vector

train_idx

Training sample indicator: "1" for train, "0" for test

e

Propensity score: true or estimated

Value

Returns CATE values estimated on the "train" sample and predicted on the "test" sample

Examples

On this page
